Posts.Content: Mar 22, 2012 08:31AM Mebelissa wrote: I just had an excision biopsy on Monday. They called it a lumpectomy and an excision biopsy, but I think it is more often called excision biopsy when you have not been diagnosed.  Mine came back benign and just some abnormal tissue, but nothing else.  It was not quite as bad as I thought.  I am still sore but am doing much better now that I know. Good luck to you and I hope all turns out well!
Posts.Title: Just got my call from the nurse and.. StephanieMO3 Mebelissa
